content:
Hi @David Hay Happy New Year!
@Sean Muir and I are planning on using ClinFHIR for the Care Planning Connacthathon Track this week. I'm noticing that some of the resources are not showing up in ClinFHIR when I Update Server in the Scenario Builder. It almost seem as if the resources that get updated are Condition, Observation, Patient, and Encounter. No other resouces - specifically Goal are showing up. They don't show up in Patient Viewer either. Can you please help?

Thanks, Emma

Hi Emma - and happy new year to you as well! Can you save the graph to the library and send me the link? All resources certainly SHOULD be updated (assuming they pass validation of course) so may well be a bug or something similar...
BTW - You do mean Graph Builder - right? Scenario Builder has been deprecated...

Hi David we started with scenario builder i will look into moving to graph builder but scenario builder is not show goals which i assume is expected behavior we were not starting from scratch so thought scenario fit better we also wanted to update the server
Hi Sean - I should really remove scenario builder - or at least put a big notice in the front! Please try in graph builder & let me know how you get on...
